actor_awards.notes: Known for her long legs and high kicks, she was a major stage star who successfully transitioned to film. She is best remembered for her role as Aunt Eller in 'Oklahoma!', a role written specifically for her by Oscar Hammerstein II for the stage musical, which she reprised in the 1955 film.

filmography.title: Oklahoma!
filmography.role_description: The tough but loving matriarch of a farm in the Oklahoma territory who tries to keep the peace between the farmers and the cowmen.
filmography.plot: In the Oklahoma territory at the turn of the twentieth century, two young cowboys vie with an evil ranch hand and a traveling peddler for the hearts of the women they love.

filmography.title: The Gang's All Here
filmography.role_description: A wealthy society matron who tries to maintain order in her household despite the chaos caused by a showgirl and a soldier.
filmography.plot: A soldier falls for a showgirl, but he's already engaged to a rich girl whose father is a business partner.

filmography.title: Down Argentine Way
filmography.role_description: A fierce, fast-talking chaperone and aunt who tries to keep her niece away from a horse breeder's son.
filmography.plot: An American heiress falls in love with an Argentine horse breeder, but their romance is threatened by a long-standing family feud.

filmography.title: Moon Over Miami
filmography.role_description: The wisecracking aunt of two sisters who travel to Miami in search of rich husbands.
filmography.plot: Two sisters and their aunt travel to Miami in search of rich husbands, pretending to be wealthy themselves.

filmography.title: Springtime in the Rockies
filmography.role_description: The companion to the female lead, providing comic relief and her signature high kicks.
filmography.plot: A Broadway show's partners have a falling out, leading to a romantic pursuit at a Canadian resort.

filmography.title: Parlor, Bedroom and Bath
filmography.role_description: A fast-talking, cynical woman who gets involved in a scheme to make a timid man appear to be a great lover.
filmography.plot: A timid man is hired to pose as a great lover to make a woman jealous, but things get complicated at a seaside mansion.

filmography.title: Flying High
filmography.role_description: A waitress desperate for a husband who sets her sights on an inventor in this musical comedy.
filmography.plot: A waitress creates a plan to marry a wealthy man, while an inventor enters his flying machine in a contest.

filmography.title: Palmy Days
filmography.role_description: The gym instructress at a bakery who becomes the love interest of a reluctant fake mystic.
filmography.plot: A timid man working for a fake medium gets a job at a bakery, where he tries to improve efficiency and find love.

filmography.title: The Opposite Sex
filmography.role_description: A wise and earthy ranch owner who offers advice to the protagonist during her divorce retreat.
filmography.plot: A woman discovers her husband is having an affair and is urged by her friends to get a divorce.

filmography.title: Dangerous When Wet
filmography.role_description: The health-conscious mother of a swimming family who travels to England to swim the English Channel.
filmography.plot: A dairy farming family of fitness enthusiasts enters a contest to swim the English Channel.

filmography.title: Home in Indiana
filmography.role_description: The supportive partner of a horse trainer who helps raise his nephew.
filmography.plot: A troubled youth is sent to live with his uncle in Indiana and finds redemption through harness racing.

filmography.title: Oh, You Beautiful Doll
filmography.role_description: The practical wife of a composer whose serious music is turned into popular ragtime hits.
filmography.plot: A song plugger turns a serious composer's melodies into ragtime hits without his knowledge.

filmography.title: Wake Up and Dream
filmography.role_description: A character in this musical fantasy set in the boarding house of a whimsical old man.
filmography.plot: A young man goes on a journey to find his missing brother, encountering musical adventures along the way.

filmography.title: Up in Mabel's Room
filmography.role_description: A character involved in the comedic misunderstandings surrounding a gift slip.
filmography.plot: A man tries to retrieve a slip he gave to an old girlfriend before his wife finds out.

filmography.title: Tall, Dark and Handsome
filmography.role_description: The girlfriend of a gangster who helps him create a fake family.
filmography.plot: A soft-hearted gangster creates a fake family to impress a woman.

filmography.title: Star Dust
filmography.role_description: A talent scout who discovers a young waitress with acting ambitions.
filmography.plot: A waitress is discovered by a talent scout and goes to Hollywood, but finds the road to stardom difficult.

filmography.title: Young People
filmography.role_description: One half of a retired vaudeville team who tries to settle down in a small town.
filmography.plot: A family of vaudevillians retires to a small New England town, but they struggle to fit in with the conservative locals.

filmography.title: The Great O'Malley
filmography.role_description: The fiancée of a strict police officer who tries to soften his heart.
filmography.plot: A rigid police officer arrests a man for a minor offense, costing him his job, but later tries to help him.

filmography.title: Stepping Out
filmography.role_description: A wife who decides to teach her straying husband a lesson by having fun herself.
filmography.plot: Two wives decide to turn the tables on their philandering husbands by living it up themselves.

filmography.title: The Man in Possession
filmography.role_description: A comedic maid character in this early talkie comedy.
filmography.plot: A man released from prison takes a job as a bailiff and falls for the woman whose house he is supposed to be watching.

filmography.title: So Long Letty
filmography.role_description: Greenwood reprised her famous stage role in this early sound film comedy.
filmography.plot: Two couples with mismatched personalities decide to swap spouses for a week to see if they are happier.

filmography.title: Peggy
filmography.role_description: A neighbor who gets involved in the romantic entanglements of two sisters.
filmography.plot: Two sisters enter the Tournament of Roses Parade queen contest, leading to romantic complications.

filmography.title: Glory
filmography.role_description: The owner of a horse farm who is skeptical of a filly's racing potential.
filmography.plot: A young woman raises a filly and believes it can be a racehorse, despite her grandmother's objections.

filmography.title: Driftwood
filmography.role_description: A woman who wants to adopt a war orphan found in a ghost town.
filmography.plot: A war orphan adopts a collie dog and is taken in by a doctor, where she uncovers a medical mystery.

filmography.title: Orders Is Orders
filmography.role_description: An American film director's assistant who causes a stir at a British army barracks.
filmography.plot: An American film company tries to use a British army barracks as a filming location, causing chaos.
